main.description: Approve or deny a follow request to a private profile. When approved, automatically creates the follow record. Requires auth.

requestUri.description: AT-URI of the follow request record to respond to

response.description: Whether to approve or deny the follow request

request.description: Reference to the updated follow request record

followRecord.description: Reference to the created follow record (only present when approved)

errors.name: RequestNotFound
errors.description: The specified follow request could not be found

errors.name: InvalidResponse
errors.description: The response value is not valid (must be 'approve' or 'deny')

errors.name: NotAuthorized
errors.description: The authenticated user is not authorized to respond to this request
